__PoolFactory_init(address,address).details: This function is called only once during the contract deployment

params._poolBeacon: Beacon address for pool proxy pattern

params.members: Pool members address encoded in bytes

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

PoolBeaconChanged(address,address).notice: Emitted when pool beacon address is changed

PoolCreated(address,address,bool,address.notice: Emitted when a new pool is created

PrimeContractChanged(address,address).notice: Emitted when prime contract address is changed

poolBeacon().notice: Beacon address for pool proxy pattern
